languages.text: "Он{rt_mf||а} заботится лишь о своих лизоблюдах!" {n}Желчь, исторгнутая изо рта Гнили, шипит на умах рабочих, словно кислота. Прожигает их.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Он{rt_mf||а} заботится лишь о своих лизоблюдах!" {n}Желчь, исторгнутая изо рта Гнили, шипит на умах рабочих, словно кислота. Прожигает их.{/n}

languages.text: "{rt_mf|He|She} only cares about {rt_mf|his|her} flunkies!" {n}The bile spraying from Rot's mouth sizzles in the workers' minds like acid. It is burning them through.{/n}

languages.text: "{rt_mf|Er|Sie} ist nur an {rt_mf|seinen|ihren} Lakaien interessiert!" {n}Die Galle aus Fäules Mund zischt auf den Geistern der Arbeiter wie Säure. Sie brennt sich hindurch.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{rt_mf|He|She} only cares about {rt_mf|his|her} flunkies!" {n}The bile spraying from Rot's mouth sizzles in the workers' minds like acid. It is burning them through.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Er|Sie} ist nur an {mf|seinen|ihren} Lakaien interessiert!" {n}Die Galle aus Mehltaus Mund zischt auf den Geistern der Arbeiter wie Säure. Sie brennt sich hindurch.{/n}

languages.text: «¡Solo le importan sus amiguitos!». {n}La bilis que escupe Podredumbre arde en las mentes de los trabajadores como ácido. Está abriendo agujeros en ellos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{rt_mf|He|She} only cares about {rt_mf|his|her} flunkies!" {n}The bile spraying from Rot's mouth sizzles in the workers' minds like acid. It is burning them through.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Solo le importan sus amiguitos!». {n}La bilis que escupe Moho arde en las mentes de los trabajadores como ácido. Está abriendo agujeros en ellos.{/n}

languages.text: 「あの方はあの方の腰巾着しか気にかけておられない！」{n}ロットの口から吐き出される胆汁は、労働者たちの心を酸のようにヒリヒリと…焼き尽くす。{/n}
languages.original_text: "{rt_mf|He|She} only cares about {rt_mf|his|her} flunkies!" {n}The bile spraying from Rot's mouth sizzles in the workers' minds like acid. It is burning them through.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あの方はあの方の腰巾着しか気にかけておられない！」{n}カビの口から飛ぶ胆汁は、労働者たちの心を酸のようにヒリヒリと…焼き尽くす。{/n}

languages.text: “{rt_mf|他|她}只在乎{rt_mf|他|她}的走狗！”{n}“脓疮”嘴里喷出的毒液，仿佛酸液一样在工人们的头脑中嘶嘶作响，将他们烧得通红。{/n}
languages.original_text: "{rt_mf|He|She} only cares about {rt_mf|his|her} flunkies!" {n}The bile spraying from Rot's mouth sizzles in the workers' minds like acid. It is burning them through.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “{mf|他|她}只在乎{mf|他|她}的走狗！”{n}“霉毯”嘴里喷出的毒液，仿佛酸液一样在工人们的头脑中嘶嘶作响，将他们烧得通红。{/n}

languages.text: « {rt_mf|Il|Elle} ne se préoccupe que de ses larbins ! » {n}La bile que crache la bouche de Pourriture dissout l'esprit des ouvriers comme de l'acide. Elle s'infiltre en eux.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{rt_mf|He|She} only cares about {rt_mf|his|her} flunkies!" {n}The bile spraying from Rot's mouth sizzles in the workers' minds like acid. It is burning them through.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Il|Elle} ne se préoccupe que de ses larbins ! » {n}La bile que crache la bouche de Moisissure dissout l'esprit des ouvriers comme de l'acide. Elle s'infiltre en eux.{/n}

languages.text: "O yalnızca kendi dalkavuklarıyla ilgilenir!" {n}Çürük'ün dudaklarından yayılan kin, işçilerin zihinlerini asit misali öfkeyle doldurarak onları içten içe yakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{rt_mf|He|She} only cares about {rt_mf|his|her} flunkies!" {n}The bile spraying from Rot's mouth sizzles in the workers' minds like acid. It is burning them through.{/n}
